page.title: 05SCHOOLS'FOOTBALL IN 1985
page.content: Football is probably the most popular sport in 1985.The objective of the game is to score a goal by using your feet or head. Schools football is exactly the same except it is played by schoolboys. There is a Large Schools Cup and a Small Schools Cup.The Small Schools Cup is celebrating it's 50th anniversary this year.It is for schools with under 300 pupils.To get to the final a team has to play 3 games,a qualifying game,a quarter final and a semi final.If the team gets to the final and wins they get a cup.Symington Primary got to the final in 1985 and lost to Kilmaurs 2-1.Also there is a Primary Schools League.In the League a team plays a series of games and at the end of the season the team with most points wins the League.
